article.title: Project Manager
article.label: Project Manager
article.intro: We need you as a full-time project manager for our projects

text.p: TechnoPark Corp., an angel-funded Florida-based custom software development company, has an opportunity for a full-time Project Manager. This is a great position for a talented and self-motivated individual, located in Naples, Florida (relocation sponsorship is negotiable). We pay $90K salary, usual benefits, and a great cash bonus on every successful project.

ul.li: At least 5 years experience in software development industry
Polish, Russian, Ukrainian, or Czech as a second language
Ability and willingness to travel 25% of time

text.p: Email directly to [HR Director](${mailto:hr}) to setup a phone interview. Please, don't call us directly, just send your resume for review. We promise to reply to ALL emails. Thanks!
